website_summaries.verdict: A simple, but effectively designed wall mount that can be installed on almost any surface.
pros: The mount is lightweight, but sturdy
Included materials and instructions made instillation simple
There is even a built in level on this mount to ensure you hang it evenly
Easily dock and un-dock the console with no obstruction from the mount
Dark plastic material has a smooth finish that looks stunning on the wall
cons: The included screws are quite short
For piece of mind, you may want to use longer ones

customer_reviews.title: Read this if you need to mount on the right side of your TV
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to install. The included bubble level is a nice touch and the drywall screws work perfectly. I needed to mount this on the right of my TV and I noticed that the bottom of the mount has the perfect place to drill holes for zip ties to route the cables under the mount to route them to the left. Check the pictures to see where I did that. I think it works pretty well if you have a similar situation.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Space saving solution.
customer_reviews.text: With all my consoles taking up space around my TV, I had to find a spot for the Switch and this is the perfect solution. Placed it behind the flat screen and up high where my two year old can't reach. Switch fits perfectly, mount is light and sturdy. UPDATE: 3/22/18 - Apparently placing it behind the TV isn't the best spot, as the Joy Cons lose connection with the switch if the distance between them is more than 5 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ceez

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall mount see pic of hidden cable installation
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy product and due the job. I took away one star because the included screws don't seem to be the best for student mounting and the heads seemed to strip with a bit of torque. As you can see from the image, I routed the wires behind the mount which required me to drill a hole big enough for the HDMI cable to pass through. I may end up securing it better with longer screws and a washer. Overall, I recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: A Prasad

customer_reviews.title: Switch Total Mount
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It is nice to have a place to put the Switch dock, considering our tv is wall mounted and there is not much room to put the dock without it looking out of place. The instructions were easy to follow and I was even sent extra screws to mount it to the wall. The mount is very sturdy, I gave it a firm tug before loading the Switch into it and I'm confident that even the niece and nephew would have a tough time ripping it down.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fields

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality -- excellent design
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these -- first one worked so well in our family room, I bought a second one for our entertainment room in our basement. Sturdy and well designed: connectors and cable routing all in ideal locations, mounting screws that work with both hollow-all drywall and studs -- very well-thought-out product. The first one stood up for months so far to our boys' use with their nintendo switch goihng in and out of the dock without any sign of movement or long-term wear. Good enough that I decided to stick with the same model/brand for our second installation.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Price - NOT

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the Switch dock and which side the cables come out before determining where to mount. I put on my right hand side behind my TV... cables come out the right-hand side which is still covered by the TV but I wish I had looked at the Switch Dock first and installed on the left-hand side. Easy Install. Everything you need is there - built in level! Nice. One step closer to getting rid of the table under my TV.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and World Class Customer service
customer_reviews.text: The installation is pretty easy and the product is sturdy enough to hold your Nintendo Switch. It comes with a built-in level that helps you to get a nice leveled setup. Besides that the Customer Care department is awesome, I recently moved to the Seattle area and lost my screws during the moving process, I contacted them via their website and they kindly sent me a set free of charge. I know that is not a lot of money but they took off the weight of going to home depot to start asking people what kind of screw should I use. That is customer service at the maximum. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Contreras.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME MOUNT
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy. With this I am able to hide my switch behind my TV. That way my daughter doesn't grab it when its docked and toss it across the room. Purchased two of these so far for my switch and actually use this brand for some other console mounts. I want to say xbox one S and PS4 pro. I had to buy a different brand for my xbox one X and that mount pretty much sucks. Wish they made one for the xbox one x....
customer_reviews.author: Juan J.

customer_reviews.title: Noice. Sturdy and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Very sturdy, took little to no time to set up. Mine has a slight gap between the bottom of my dock and the bottom of the mount, but I think it's meant to be like that. All in all, serves the purpose very well, and looks very nice!! For anyone wondering, I do have a dock sock on my dock, as can be seen in the picture. It still fits nicely into the mount, though it is a little bit snug and you do have to hold the sock down while you put the covered dock in, however I prefer that to my dock sitting in there loosely.
customer_reviews.author: Vanyel

customer_reviews.title: I love the mount
customer_reviews.text: The mount comes with great drywall screws; designed so that they don't need anchors. It was super easy to install because of the built-in level. My only critique would be that the dock is really snug. I had to lightly hammer the Switch dock into this wall mount and it makes the cords coming from the back even more cramped, and i'm worried that they will get damaged over time. But so far they are working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great mount
customer_reviews.text: The mount was easy to install and came with drywall screws. It has 6 total mounting screw holes and a built in level. It seems sufficiently sturdy, but I used mounting screws not included with the packaging. My only complaint is from the hooks for the joy cons. I wish they were collapsible or not there since it’s only ever mounted and used with a pro controller.
customer_reviews.author: == true;

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use the screws
customer_reviews.text: We got this to put the switch behind the TV. It works great. I love the added level. The screws that are included are terrible! Ditch the screws they provided and use something suitable for drywall (if using it on drywall).
customer_reviews.author: K. Groves

customer_reviews.title: so thankful this exists 💓
customer_reviews.text: I needed a way to keep my dock safe from my cats and this is it! my dad installed it and loved that it had a level in it. the only con is that when u lift the switch out the dock it tends to want to come with the switch. to be fair I have a case on my switch so that could be why (never docked it without a case) but thought i would mention that.
customer_reviews.author: Kat the disabled mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Total mount doing everything right!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd total mount I have purchased. The first was the ps4 pro and if that one wasn’t amazing I wouldn’t of bought this one right? Built in levels in there designs are amazing and so helpful. Very easy to install. Came with drywall screws and that’s all I used to attach to my wall. I feel like some people don’t understand how much room you can save by getting your systems off the desk and on the wall. This product is just genius!
customer_reviews.author: Zackery M.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase yet
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to keep our toddler from grabbing our new switch. unless every single surface in my house was unlevel...The level seemed a teeny bit off (bubble leaned more to the right than in the middle, but was still technically in between the lines lol) will be buying a 2nd one for when we take the console upstairs to play on the other tv.
customer_reviews.author: MizzVivi84

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today, it was pretty easy to install, the screws went in really easily and my switch slid into the holder easily. Make sure to install it to the left of your TV because that's where the wires will hang down. The built in leveler is extremely helpful, especially since I don't own a leveler. I'm gonna use the joy con hangers because it looks really neat. My family is gonna be jealous because their switch is on a table.
customer_reviews.author: FrostySquidKid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. Had no issue with the fit. Mounting screws for dry wall were really nice, not a cheap metal. Built in level was a great idea. Everything about this mount was what I wanted and needed. Overall really happy with product. Will buy from this brand again for my other systems.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Dockable with glass screen and mumba blade case
customer_reviews.text: Having just acquired a switch (thanks to some conniving friends of mine), keeping it away from my 1 year old was paramount. I got a glass screen protector and a Mumba Blade case to protect it from accidental exposure to the toddler. I read reviews that said having both these items made it hard to place in the dock that came with the system, and it did feel like a bit of a squeeze (though I didnt want to try too hard to get the goods in) Pleased to say that this docks quite easily, and also we mounted it to the tv stand via zip ties and is sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi

customer_reviews.title: not quite as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: well my switch is up on the wall. the screws are placed in kind of funny places. the screws themselves are a little too soft and cheap. one of the 4 screws isnt quite tight, even though it wont screw in anymore. not sure I would get this one again
customer_reviews.author: Chris Adams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and holds up!
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I wanted! It even came with a built in level so that I made sure it was sitting perfect after every screw. Not to mention, it was absolutely easy as can be to install. It comes with the items necessary to get it installed quickly and boy does it hold up! My daughter has already tried pulling it off the wall and it didn’t budge one bit. That’s saying a lot considering our apartment walls aren’t the best quality. I give this two thumbs up and five stars for being a cozy and safe place for the family Switch to live. :)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Magaña

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff right here.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is easier to use than your mom. Very simple setup. Lots of screws (your mom) makes it feel secure. I was easily able to stand on top of it without it budging. Neighbors came over and we all stood on it and summoned the Dark Lord. 10/10 - Would stand on and summon evil entities again.
customer_reviews.author: angelb

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I have my TV mounted on the wall in my bedroom so when i found this i figured it would be a good thing to have. I was easily able to mount it right under my TV. It's easy to install and get it level because it has a built in level in it. I highly recommend this mount for the Switch! I think it was a very smart buy.
customer_reviews.author: K. D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: So you wanna wall mount your Switch?
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things i did for my switch. I put it behind my TV but i argued with myself on displaying it on the left side of the TV to showcase my joy cons that i have. Either way this is a must have and it helps keeping your kids off your switch lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent wall mount. This was super easy to install and looks great. Would be awesome if there was a way to route the wires underneath so that I could mount the switch on the right side of my tv but it’s no big deal. That’s more of Nintendo’s design flaw than anything else. Overall worth the money and plan on buying an AppleTV Mount from this company as well!
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a built in level. 2 screw and done. Holds the original/official dock snug. Well worth the money. Gives a little space between the dock and the wall for it to breathe. Absolutely love it. Only thing better would be a built in USB hub and cooling fan.
customer_reviews.author: SoldierOfChr1st

customer_reviews.title: Great space saving product.
customer_reviews.text: I am reorganizing my living room and find that there are too many boxes, cables and remote controls everywhere. This helps me free up space and provides a discreet space for the NES Switch. Great space saving product.
customer_reviews.author: GLS

customer_reviews.title: Great and Well Made!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed and Well made easy to install and cost makes it even more attractive to purchase. Planning to get the case for my PS4 Pro as well makes things much easier to display. Pick one up today
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying another for our 2nd Switch
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly easy to install. There is a level already on the mount which made things even easier. We mounted it to the left of the TV (as recommended) so there are no annoying cords hanging around.
customer_reviews.author: Traysea Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Item works exactly as it says. Mounted mine directly behind the TV and it keeps it away from animals and small kids. I also find that the controller motion control is picked up better now that it is elevated and mounted. Seems secure and was easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mount for your Switch.
customer_reviews.text: Great mount. Should have done this from the start. Have it where it’s mounted behind my TV, easy to mount to the wall, and Switch fits perfectly and secure. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jase

customer_reviews.title: Great SINPLE solution
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty simple concept, to begin with, but it does the job better than I expected. Design easily controls heat and the Switch is secure when charging behind the TV!
customer_reviews.author: Bellicose504

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Great mount. Level makes it easy to install. The dock feels like it snaps into place and fits snugly. Looks great, but I have it hidden behind our wall mounted tv so that doesnt really matter for my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and has level on the back to line us straight. Extra mounting equipment just in case. Everything you would want from the product and even a little cheaper than other products I saw.
customer_reviews.author: Waylon Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, elegant and easy to install. I love this thing. Frees up desktop space since I mounted this on the wall next to my monitor. I have LED lights mounted on the back of my monitor and I was thinking that in the next iteration, maybe they can have LED lights behind the mount to make it look even cooler? Still, this is a wonderful product, and am going to buy another one for my son's room.
customer_reviews.author: Grouchy Dude

customer_reviews.title: Stress Free
customer_reviews.text: The switch was the last of my gaming rig to be mounted. After a day of leveling, marking, wall anchors, and slight imperfections. This was a relief. Easy. Quick. Built to be stress free.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Madonia

customer_reviews.title: To make the ultimate cool look, get one of these
customer_reviews.text: We previously had tape to the back of the existing Nintendo Switch dock which was a stupid idea and really didnt work well. We move to this and it feels solid, and there is never a worry about the switch falling down. Can be secured both on concrete and plaster boards easily.
customer_reviews.author: Playbooth

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, well
customer_reviews.text: This is a good unit. It holds my switch on the wall very well... I didn't follow the advice to only use a screwdriver though, I used a drill. I highly advise using a drill.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my weird set up. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: So I have a bit of a weird set up going on. I have a wall mounted projector right above the bed with no headboard or anything. This product solved the issue with placement of my Switch. I love that it comes with a built in level and screws for different mounting applications! I drilled into drywall and a stud and this holds my Switch in place very very well. A recommended buy for weird setups such as mine!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M

customer_reviews.title: KCCO
customer_reviews.text: works great. Holds Switch in place. Love the little handles for the JoyCon controller straps, even though we barely use them not connected to the system.
customer_reviews.author: D3ATH

customer_reviews.title: A bit disapointing that it's plastic and not metal, but does work.
customer_reviews.text: The built-in level is really helpful so I'm real glad it has that. Holds my Nintendo Switch perfectly above my PS4 Pro next to the TV. I do wish that it was metal instead, but this works good too. Thanks to this I can now have both my PS4 Pro and Nintendo Switch both out and connected always^^
customer_reviews.author: Mahdi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Literally didn't even need a drill. It comes with six screws, 3 on top and 3 on the bottom. It took me less than 10 minutes. It's extremely sturdy and it makes displaying my switch so much cooler than just setting it on a table!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality mount.
customer_reviews.text: TotalMount makes amazing products. They are of high quality, and precisely designed to make it the mount to own. The attention to detail is what makes all the difference, they incorporated a level into the design and makes it a breeze to install.
customer_reviews.author: JxBuen

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot is needed to be said on this. Ease of install: Amazing!!! Built in level: Simple yet genius!!! Looks: Amazing!!! Wife satisfaction of organization: Super Satisfied!!! Recommendation: Yes Absolutely, Total100%
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Solid and convenient mount
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid product. The built-in level is a rather convenient feature. Not at all worried about it falling off. Installed mine behind the TV. Had to install it a little higher to fit which makes the switch power cord too high to touch the ground. I like that the USB ports are accessible and I can still remove both the switch and the dock easily. Using all 6 screws seems excessive. I used 2 into a stud. I don't believe it came with drywall anchors so you might need to bring your own.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lavalleur

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and was easy to attach. The screws that came with it were too big for what I needed but the head of my other screws still fit the hole properly.
customer_reviews.author: Robbles

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, very helpful and easy to install!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice! It’s super sturdy and the built-in level helped a lot with the installation! I’m living in a small space so this was a really nice way to help me save room for other items while still displaying my switch <3 A nice little touch is the window they added that lets you see the power light so you can tell when it’s on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great purchase. There truly is no way to mess up the install. They even tell you not to over tighten the screws which is common sense. Material is actually nice! Console fits nice and snug in the mount. The mount is nice and a must in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Craig L. Soeder

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Easy, and Strong
customer_reviews.text: This wall mount for the Nintendo Switch was one of the easiest things I've ever had to mount to a wall. It comes with all the necessary hardware and there is a level built into the frame of the unit making installation a breeze. I believe it took me all of 3 minutes to install. I didn't even put all 6 screws in and I pulled on the mount and it had no give to it. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to wall mount their Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, easy to install and looks great. We got this along with several other mounts to help childproof our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Rubidoux

customer_reviews.title: Great, but you need a drill
customer_reviews.text: Great device to get your Switch off a table, counter or entertainment system. Switch fits perfectly. Unless your drywall is made of paper, you absolutely need a drill, or brute strength, one or the other.
customer_reviews.author: Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Works very very well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a bigger TV and needed to move the switch. Just for access and controller reception. This thing is really cool. Try it out ypull dig it.
customer_reviews.author: grizz222

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: Man I love the Total Mount and how my Switch is hanging on my wall. Now my 2 year old daughter can't reach and mess with it anymore. Now I need to get one for all the rest of my systems lol. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Overall, sturdy mount. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This mount was super easy to install. Not drilling necessary. Screws go right into the drywall and hold firmly. The attached bubble level makes for a nice, straight install. Just DO NOT over tighten the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Very easy to install and happy I was able to hide my Switch to clean up the look of my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Affinati

customer_reviews.title: Only option for mounting systems
customer_reviews.text: Super easy and no concerns. I bought the big 3(PS4, XBOX ONE, and Switch) for our game room. You need to plan out your mounting positions. All cords will exit to the right. Regardless, this was perfect and I'm not stressed if the systems will fall. The drywall screws are great quality and give you the flexibility of working around without hunting for studs. Thank you for a truly advertised product.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. It holds the switch snugly and securely. It has a built-in level for easy install. The screws are pretty heavy duty and they even give you an extra one. There are hooks on either side to hold the joy-cons when not in use. I installed this in less than a minute. Overall, I am very impressed with the quality and features.
customer_reviews.author: NINJA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! I love clean installs; this was a cinch. This thing is stupid easy to set up...looks nice and has stood the test of time thus far. If we buy another gaming system, I will order this again. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: TopKev

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wall mount for your nintendo switch. Aesthetically pleasing too! I will need to order a couple controller wall mounts next. A+
customer_reviews.author: HavnFun

customer_reviews.title: When you hang $200 game system
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if there was value for the product but there was enough trust from a lot of users that I wouldn't try anything else. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: EddieLips

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: At first i was skeptical about the 6 drywall anchor screws holding this thing up well, but they really do the job quite nicely. It's not going anywhere and the attached level also did it's job nicely as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mount
customer_reviews.text: very nice wall mount. Holds everything without concern for falling or damage. all cords and ports remain accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Roosevelt

customer_reviews.title: A must have accessory
customer_reviews.text: Makes it so convenient to charge the switch, play on the TV, and grab the console for handheld gaming. No unsightly wires.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best idea for mounted TV connection
customer_reviews.text: This mount was really easy to hang on the wall. The Switch fits into it perfectly snug so there’s no worry it will fall out. It’s the perfect solution if you have a mounted flat screen and you want to connect to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay D. Hitchner

customer_reviews.title: Must for keeping it secure and space saving
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift and they loved it its a lot more secure now. If you have a switch this is a great space saver
customer_reviews.author: Crimsoncat

customer_reviews.title: Best system mount on market
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd total mount product to mount our switch systems to the wall. They are so easy to install and we love how study and sense of safety they gives us with our young children. Great product and the only brand I will purchase for mounting my systems.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha McComas

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY TO INSTALL AND USE
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just over my expectations. Installation is very simple and easy. you would need an electric drill. however, it's good that you don't have to find a stud and just install it with the screws included. I only installed 3 screws but it's just holding it so well..
customer_reviews.author: Seung Ri Hong

customer_reviews.title: installing is not easy. but overall solid and quality mount for your switch.
customer_reviews.text: item arrived much earlier than expected. although it states that no drill is needed, you definitely need some drilling if the wall is concrete. took me 2 hours in installing the item, overall it looks sturdy and can support the nintendo switch dock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy to keep a clean look
customer_reviews.text: Was able to mount this behind my TV to hide the Nintendo Switch. Works like a charm. Great functionality and very sturdy. The hardware is great and not cheap. Easy to install, pretty self explanatory.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mount for the Switch! Easy to mount and all everything you need is included (except the screw driver) Definitely going to order the ps4 and Xbox x mounts next!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan W.

customer_reviews.title: product as described
customer_reviews.text: I was able to mount the Nintendo behind the wall in the attic to keep my 2 year olds from messing with my 7 year olds nintendo she has a pro controller and it is a seamless install
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This mount is very good and easy to install. The kit includes 6 screws that hold pretty well. The built in level made it super easy to adjust on the wall. It also has room in the back for good airflow.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S

customer_reviews.title: Easy install easy use
customer_reviews.text: Built in level makes it easy to mount, great for mounting behind tvs or out of sight
customer_reviews.author: Brock & Jess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just like it says. Easy to install and has a level right on it. Just what we needed
customer_reviews.author: WillE

customer_reviews.title: Must buy Nintendo Switch Accessory
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to install and is very sturdy. The included screws worked great in my drywall. They are similar to some screws I purchased to mount a cabinet. The built in level is a great feature. I needed to mount it high up to keep my toddler from always messing with the switch and am very happy with it. I am going to recommend it to everyone who buys a switch.
customer_reviews.author: George Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised but cheap hardware included.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised but the hardware included is of cheap quality. While it’s easy to install, I would have preferred wall anchors or halfway decent screws to mount on a stud. The built in level is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: huni

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product Was easy to installed and now it gets the dock off the tabletop
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Installed it today and it definitely is amazing. I have three toddlers and this mount is helping keep my switch safe. :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and cleans up the ugly look of what was there before.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Casperson

customer_reviews.title: Space at the Right Price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, sturdy, and safe. I bought this to make sure my toddler didn't knock over the Switch or pull wires. However it also looks nice, saves room, and holds extra joycons. Price is right too!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love this mount. have the Xbox one and Switch mount and they are amazing. Have them just to keep the systems away from my pc setup and its beautiful. Easy to install and holds the systems snug. I'm not worried about them falling off or anything. Thinking of getting the one for the Roku in the bedroom. (hint hint send me one). GREAT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: W.S

customer_reviews.title: The best looking switch mount
customer_reviews.text: Best wall mount for switch, I just wish they sold the controller mounts with it. Its fine though, I like the built in level and design.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 above and beyond quality
customer_reviews.text: 10/10. This thing comes nicely packaged. Looks very nice. BUILT IN LEVEL to make sure its straight. I've also purchased other Total Mount products and their quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Prince

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mounting!
customer_reviews.text: This made it easy to mount parallel to my TV, not just to keep things clean, but it also makes it easy to take and go for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed, and the built in level msde it 5 (exceeded) stars!😍 I wish they made mounts for the PS4 Pro and the XBOX One X; I would have bought them too!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Very stable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was a little concerned about this mount not being stable because it doesn't need to be in a stud. This mount is amazing and very well made. I'm super happy about the quality of this mount. Also the built in level works very well. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know I needed this, so happy to have it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent if you want things hidden
customer_reviews.text: Mounts up nicely. Fits the switch perfectly. Would buy again if I had the need.
customer_reviews.author: Michael VanPay

customer_reviews.title: Kid proof
customer_reviews.text: Amazing wall mount and easy to install. I didnt use an anchor for the drywall and it comes with a prebuilt level. I also have a ps4 one and that's y I bought this one. I have kids and if you're a parent you will understand what I mean by that statement and my review.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Best for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: It comes with the screws and is easy to install because it brings a level. The switch fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Osniel Castroman

customer_reviews.title: Great model for limited space
customer_reviews.text: Even if you dont have a wall mounted television, this is a great product for compact storage space. It fits well on the wall behind my monitor. It's also super sturdy and a nice grip on the dock so you dont take out the entire dock when removing the switch. Would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!! Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Functional. Installation is easy. And it’s easy to slide the dock in and out of the bracket as well. Installed it behind the television. Nice for keeping clutter off the entertainment center.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great switch dock wall mount!
customer_reviews.text: Mounted nicely and easily, and holds everything I need it to. Can pull the switch out of the dock without it moving at all. It is plastic though so if you’re looking metal this is not.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T.

customer_reviews.title: This Nintendo Switch Mount is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This Nintendo Switch Mount is Awesome. I got it yesterday and the item is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I would say be careful if you have a dockable case + a screen protector since it reduces the slight flex that the dock naturally has. besides that, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST MOUNT MONEY CAN BUY FOR YOUR SWITCH!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mount is perfect and no doubt the best one out on the market it's a must and have no complaints at all about this item I give it a 100 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: The Dukes Brew

customer_reviews.title: Good accessory for dock.
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Easy to mount to wall or tv stand. I mounted mine on the side of our tv stand.
customer_reviews.author: dwcleck

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product and very easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. It was a very easy installation and my switch console fits perfectly into this mount.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Holzinger

customer_reviews.title: Poof it's gone.
customer_reviews.text: One of my top purchases of 2018, keeps the system out of the way behind the television, my young ones have a place to put it with ease, wish it had a place to put the accessories (the pro/joycon controls), still great, I'll be ordering a second one for their room.
customer_reviews.author: Deli

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect place to keep the switch, and easy for any average person to install.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff Guru

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, hassle free, looks great! It is darker than the picture portrays it and its made out of plastic. But the thing is amazing and has made my life of playing the switch on the tv so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

product_meta.title: TotalMount for Nintendo Switch (Mounts Nintendo Switch on wall near TV)
feature_bullets: PLEASE CLICK ON THE IMAGES to learn about the premium features included with this Total Mount.

DO YOU HAVE A WALL-MOUNTED TV and need a secure place to put your Nintendo Switch? In the past, people often put their Nintendo on an entertainment center, but now many wall-mounted TV owners need a mounting shelf near their TV that prevents accidental falls when users insert and remove Nintendo Switch from the Dock.
EASY INSTALLATION thanks to our patent-pending built-in level and drill-free installation option. Installation is quick, simple, and only requires a screwdriver.

COMPATIBLE with Nintendo Switch. This mount is not compatible with other gaming systems. (Nintendo Switch is not included with this mount. This product enables you to mount the Dock that comes with each Nintendo Switch on the wall near your TV.)
TOTAL MOUNT is the trusted leader in media-player mounting. You may have seen our products in Apple Stores.
